Package com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream

Class AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator<T,U extends StreamMessage<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream.AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of elements
    U - the type of the publisher and duplicated stream messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SafeCloseable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpRequestDuplicator, HttpResponseDuplicator
    public abstract class AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator<T,U extends StreamMessage<T>>
extends Object
implements SafeCloseable
    Allows subscribing to a StreamMessage multiple times by duplicating the stream.

    Only one subscriber can subscribe other stream messages such as DefaultStreamMessage, DeferredStreamMessage, etc. This factory is wrapping one of those StreamMessages and spawns duplicated stream messages which are created using duplicateStream() and subscribed by subscribers one by one.

    The published elements can be shared across Subscribers, so do not manipulate the data unless you copy them. Only one case does not share the elements which is when you StreamMessage.subscribe(Subscriber, boolean) with the withPooledObjects as false while the elements is one of two pooled object classes which are ByteBufHolder and ByteBuf.

    This factory has to be closed by close() when you do not need the contents anymore, otherwise memory leak might happen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator

        protected AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator​(U publisher,
                                          SignalLengthGetter<? super T> signalLengthGetter,
                                          @Nullable
                                          EventExecutor executor,
                                          long maxSignalLength)
        Creates a new instance wrapping a publisher and publishing to multiple subscribers.
        Parameters:
        publisher - the publisher who will publish data to subscribers
        signalLengthGetter - the signal length getter that produces the length of signals
        executor - the executor to use for upstream signals
        maxSignalLength - the maximum length of signals. 0 disables the length limit

    • Method Detail

      • duplicateStream

        public U duplicateStream()
        Creates a new AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator instance that publishes data from the publisher you create this factory with.

      • duplicateStream

        public U duplicateStream​(boolean lastStream)
        Creates a new AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator instance that publishes data from the publisher you create this factory with. If you specify the lastStream as true, it will prevent further creation of duplicate stream.

      • doDuplicateStream

        protected abstract U doDuplicateStream​(StreamMessage<T> delegate)
        Creates a new AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator instance that wraps AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator.ChildStreamMessage and forwards its method invocations to it.
        Parameters:
        delegate - AbstractStreamMessageDuplicator.ChildStreamMessage

      • duplicatorExecutor

        protected EventExecutor duplicatorExecutor()
        Returns the default EventExecutor which will be used when a user subscribes to a child stream using StreamMessage.subscribe(Subscriber) or StreamMessage.subscribe(Subscriber, boolean).

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this factory and stream messages who are invoked by duplicateStream(). Also, clean up the data published from publisher. If duplicateStream(boolean) with true is called already, invoking this method does not affect and cleaning up occurs when all of the Subscriptions are completed or cancelled.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface SafeCloseable
